did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle:
A Guide to the Royal Arch Masons of Virginia - Dove Chapter Number 44 Organization Records,
1855-1875
did.physloc: The Library of Virginia, Local Government Records Collection, Louisa County

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Royal Arch Masons of Virginia - Dove Chapter Number 44 Organization Records, 1855-1875. Local Government Records Collection, Louisa County Court Records, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Louisa County.

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Dove Chapter Number 44 was the local chapter in Louisa County of the Grand Chapter of Royal Arch Masons of Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Cash account book, 1855-1875, of Dove Chapter Number 44 of the Grand Chapter of Royal Arch Masons of Virginia that records cash received from and cash paid by the organization related to expenses, purchases, and payments to national chapter. Volume also records cash received from and cash paid by the organization's members. Each account lists chronologically members' contributions to degrees, payment of dues, and other debts owed the chapter and form of payment. A list of members names found at front of volume. It also includes an index that lists members' names in alphabetical order and page numbers where their accounts can be found.
